title: Amaenaide yo!! Katsu!! (Dub)
alternative_title: Ah My Buddha Katsu, Amaenaideyo!! 2, Amaenaideyo!! Katsu, あまえないでよっ!! 喝!!
description: In this sequel, a girl named Kazusano Kazuki join up with the 6 girls and Ikko. With Kazuki around, Ikko will find himself in more embarassing situations with these priestesses-in-training.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Ecchi>, <Genre -> Harem>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
